title: A Corredoira
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cozy tapas bar near Porta do Cami√±, one of few choices for vegan tapas in Santiago de Compostela. Generous tapas come complimentary with drink purchase from 8-11pm. Let your waitstaff know you if are vegan/vegetarian. Also has a simple menu card with a variety of sandwiches and burgers, some of which are vegan suitable (falafel, tofu meatballs, falafel or tofu burger, vegan Spanish omelette, fries with garlic or spicy brava sauce).
